title: Wireless nights
brief_description: For older lonely people, talk back radio is both a solace and a connection to the wilder world. This luminous documentary concentrates on people’s faces and the living rooms, kitchens and bedrooms in which they live to create a blessedly humane mediation on age, loneliness and technology.
